interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce)
Review Date: 2021/03/15
Store: Pure Extracts
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'}
Review Text: It's got to be the Calendula oil that leaves your skin so moisturized after using this soap.  I first smelled the very subtle fragrance and thought I'd enjoy this soap enough to purchase it again till I also realized it's really moisturizing.  I think you'll be very happy with how it leaves your skin feeling most of all.  It's advertised as being all natural as well so if you have sensitive skin, you shouldn't have any problems with this although I'd always recommend trying a test patch first before using it in the shower all over.
Review Title: Bar of Soap with Calendula Oil
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) GENTS OF LONDON {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} This hair paste is awesome! for the price, it almost even out performs some way more expensive hair products! I used to use Paul Mitchell hair paste, but this is probably going to be my go to now.

This stuff does have somewhat of a smell, but it smells sort of like the original old spice. It's not too strong though, but if you want something scentless, then you may wanna try something else. Smells Kinda like Old Spice Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Sdara Skincare {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Seriously there’s nothing better on a sunburn than Aloe Vera. It’s natural and won’t harm your skin. This aloe has a clear color so there’s no artificial dyes contained in this gel. Just pure headlining and soothing properties. I feel for the size of the bottle, it’s a great bargain and it’s effective. Cooling Natural Aloe Vera 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Vedory ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe. I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask. If you're having a hard time, give these a try. They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy. Mask Brackets Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Zeitun {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} I didn't notice a distinct fragrance from this scrub. It does faintly smell of coffee but I had hoped there would be more of a spicy smell. But, this is a nice feeling scrub against your skin. It does make your skin feel energized. I'm not sure how long it would take to make my cellulite become less visible but I will keep using it for the mere purpose that it does feel good. I would say too that it would make a good gift because it's so unique. I do recommend this product and for the price it's a good value for either a gift or keeping it for yourself as a treat. Enjoy! Coffee Scrub Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) TECHEALTH {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} If you are concerned about the environment and like a simple way to remove your makeup, these are for you! You use these microfiber pads once and you can wash them in a bag that is provided for you in this pouch. It couldn't be easier or better for our environment. I feel this would make an excellent gift for someone as well. Everything you need is all included in this ziplock pouch. It's a big savings financially to have pads that can be washed and reused over and over again. I think you'll enjoy this product very much. Reusable Makeup Removal Pads with Laundry bag Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Rancco {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} I want to explain why I didn't give this neat product a better rating. First let me say that I do like the idea - i love it in fact. I was so excited about receiving this product because it was so different and unique. I wanted to learn how to use this product in different ways. When I received it, I got the bag as pictured above and couldn't figure out what was inside. There was no description on the outside at all. I didn't know what was inside till I ripped the bag open. After I opened it, I immediately saw the beautifully colored foil wrapped buds and remembered "Oh yes, this is the flower buds that I saw that can be used as tea, bath pods and for baking." There was no description, instructions or anything inside other than the beautifully foil wrapped buds. I'm still left wondering how I will use them. If I use for tea, I suppose I just wing it and drink the tea when I think it's done as there's no recipe for how long to steep to experience the perfect amount of flavor is extracted. If I use for a bath, I'm sure there would be much more flexibility but it also advertises you can use for baking. I have no idea how to use it for that. If I wanted to use it for a gift, it would be incomplete not to mention that in order to even know what I ordered, I had to already open the pretty bag so that would ruin the presentation. I feel this is a great product with great potential to be a high end gift or luxury indulgence. They just have one more step to complete in the way of instructions and explanation on the packaging to make it achieve it's potential. This idea could easily go viral and become very popular. Dried Flower Buds Kneipp Body Lotion (Lavender) {'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'lavender,vitamin a', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.72 x 13.7 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} I love that this is Vegan! It's got good things for your skin other than the relaxing qualities of Lavender. It's got Vitamin A and Almond Oil in this lotion. It comes out very thick and creamy. The scent is amazing too. It is very calming for you and I'd suggest using it right before bed. It's just the ticket to a good sleep regimen. You will love this lotion as much as I do I'm certain of it! Lavender Lotion Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Pure Extracts {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} It's got to be the Calendula oil that leaves your skin so moisturized after using this soap. I first smelled the very subtle fragrance and thought I'd enjoy this soap enough to purchase it again till I also realized it's really moisturizing. I think you'll be very happy with how it leaves your skin feeling most of all. It's advertised as being all natural as well so if you have sensitive skin, you shouldn't have any problems with this although I'd always recommend trying a test patch first before using it in the shower all over. Bar of Soap with Calendula Oil
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preference:** The user prioritizes effective hair styling products, favoring professional-grade items with a firm hold, while remaining open to affordable alternatives that achieve similar results.

- **Scent Sensitivity:** The user has a moderate tolerance for scents and prefers mild, natural aromas, particularly calming scents that enhance relaxation, especially for nighttime use.

- **Brand Loyalty:** The user maintains flexibility in brand allegiance, choosing products based on performance rather than brand loyalty. They gravitate toward high-quality, natural items with unique offerings that demonstrate effectiveness.

- **Value-Consciousness:** The user is value-driven, seeking quality products that provide efficacy at reasonable prices. They appreciate items perceived as bargains, reflecting a budget-conscious mindset.

- **Health & Safety Preferences:** The user favors products that promote health and comfort, emphasizing eco-friendly, clearly labeled options that positively contribute to their experiences.

- **Eco-Consciousness:** The user is committed to sustainability, opting for reusable and environmentally friendly products that align with their values and enhance personal care.

- **Shopping Experience:** The user values clear instructions and packaging that enhance usability, desiring a comprehensive understanding of product applications for maximum enjoyment.

The user's recent experience with a moisturizing body soap indicates a growing interest in natural skincare, particularly for sensitive skin, while still prioritizing effective performance. They demonstrate an ongoing commitment to vegan and eco-friendly products. Overall, they emphasize quality, sustainability, and effectiveness in their product choices.
